operation.description: The operation to perform on the media

phoneNumberId.description: The ID of the business account's phone number to store the media

recipientPhoneNumber.description: Phone number of the recipient of the message

mediaFileName.description: The name to use for the file

textBody.description: The body of the message (max 4096 characters)

mediaPath.description: Use a link, an ID, or n8n to upload a video
x-enumDescriptions: When using a link, WhatsApp will download the video, saving you the step of uploading video yourself
You can use an ID if you have already uploaded the video to WhatsApp
Upload a binary file on the item being processed in n8n

mediaLink.description: Link of the media to be sent

mediaId.description: ID of the media to be sent

mediaPropertyName.description: Name of the binary property which contains the data for the file to be uploaded

mediaFilename.description: The name of the file (required when using a file ID)

x-enumNames: UYI - Uruguay Peso en Unidades Indexadas (UI)
XBA - Bond Markets Unit European Composite Unit (EURCO)
XBB - Bond Markets Unit European Monetary Unit (E.M.U.-6)
XBC - Bond Markets Unit European Unit of Account 9 (E.U.A.-9)
XBD - Bond Markets Unit European Unit of Account 17 (E.U.A.-17)
XTS - Codes specifically reserved for testing purposes
XXX - The codes assigned for transactions where no currency is involved

x-enumDescriptions: Allows your customer to call a phone number and visit a website

x-enumNames: UYI - Uruguay Peso en Unidades Indexadas (UI)
XBA - Bond Markets Unit European Composite Unit (EURCO)
XBB - Bond Markets Unit European Monetary Unit (E.M.U.-6)
XBC - Bond Markets Unit European Unit of Account 9 (E.U.A.-9)
XBD - Bond Markets Unit European Unit of Account 17 (E.U.A.-17)
XTS - Codes specifically reserved for testing purposes
XXX - The codes assigned for transactions where no currency is involved

x-enumDescriptions: User can approve/disapprove from within the message
User can submit a response via a form
User can submit a response via a custom form

fieldName.description: The name of the field, used in input attributes and referenced by the workflow

fieldLabel.description: Label that appears above the input field

fieldType.description: The type of field to add to the form

elementName.description: Optional field. It can be used to include the html in the output.

placeholder.description: Sample text to display inside the field

defaultValue.description: Default value(s) that will be pre-selected. Must match one or multiple of the option labels. Separate multiple pre-selected options with a comma.

fieldValue.description: Input value can be set here or will be passed as a query parameter via Field Name if no value is set

multiselect.description: Whether to allow the user to select multiple options from the dropdown list

html.description: HTML elements to display on the form page

multipleFiles.description: Whether to allow the user to select multiple files from the file input or just one

acceptFileTypes.description: Comma-separated list of allowed file extensions

requiredField.description: Whether to require the user to enter a value for this field before submitting the form

responseFormTitle.description: Title of the form that the user can access to provide their response

responseFormDescription.description: Description of the form that the user can access to provide their response

responseFormCustomCss.description: Override default styling of the response form with CSS

limitWaitTime.description: Whether to limit the time this node should wait for a user response before execution resumes

limitType.description: Sets the condition for the execution to resume. Can be a specified date or after some time.
x-enumDescriptions: Waits for a certain amount of time
Waits until the set date and time to continue

maxDateAndTime.description: Continue execution after the specified date and time

appendAttribution.description: Whether to include the phrase "This message was sent automatically with n8n" to the end of the message
